title: Welcoming a New Team Member and Discussing Projects

lines.speaker: female_us_1
lines.text: Hi everyone, this is Alex, our new front-end developer. Let's give him a warm welcome!

lines.speaker: male_us_1
lines.text: Hello Alex, nice to meet you. I'm David, I work on the back-end team.

lines.speaker: female_us_2
lines.text: Welcome, Alex! I'm Sarah, the project manager. I coordinate tasks and deadlines for the team.

lines.speaker: male_us_2
lines.text: Hi Alex, I'm Tom. I focus on testing and quality assurance. We'll work closely together.

lines.speaker: male_us_1
lines.text: So Alex, could you tell us a bit about yourself?

lines.speaker: male_us_2
lines.text: Sure! I've been building websites for three years, mostly with React and JavaScript. I'm excited to join this team.

lines.speaker: female_us_1
lines.text: That's great! We often use React in our projects, so your skills will be very helpful.

lines.speaker: female_us_2
lines.text: We usually start the week with a short stand-up meeting. It's a good way to stay aligned.

lines.speaker: male_us_1
lines.text: Actually, we're working on a new e-commerce website right now. It's one of our biggest projects this year.

lines.speaker: male_us_2
lines.text: Yes, the site needs to be fast and mobile-friendly. We're aiming for a modern design.

lines.speaker: female_us_1
lines.text: Alex, you'll start by helping with the product pages. They need some interactive features.

lines.speaker: male_us_2
lines.text: That sounds perfect. I enjoy building interactive components, like image sliders and dynamic menus.

lines.speaker: female_us_2
lines.text: We also use GitHub for version control. Do you feel comfortable with that?

lines.speaker: male_us_2
lines.text: Yes, I've used GitHub in all my previous projects. Collaboration tools are essential.

lines.speaker: male_us_1
lines.text: Great! Later this week, we'll have a design review meeting. It's a good chance to share ideas.

lines.speaker: female_us_1
lines.text: And don't worry, if you have questions, just ask. We're all here to help.

lines.speaker: male_us_2
lines.text: Thanks everyone, I already feel welcome. I'm looking forward to working with you!
